function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious disease propagation due to increased use of telemedical services and community updates","Impact":"Increase in the risk of disease spread due to higher usage of these services","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, enforce social distancing, and promote vaccination programs","Technologies":"Telemedicine software with secure video conferencing, contact tracing apps, and online appointment booking systems","People":"Residents using telemedical services and community updates, healthcare workers at risk of exposure","Owner":"Healthcare providers, local government, community organizations"},{"Description":"Increased WTP for wellbeing features among older residents","Impact":"Potential exclusion of older residents from access to important wellbeing features","Mitigation":"Promote awareness and accessibility for older residents, provide support and training for technology use","Technologies":"User-friendly interfaces, accessibility features, and digital education programs for older adults","People":"Older residents, especially those with limited digital literacy","Owner":"Technology companies, community organizations, local government"},{"Description":"Negative impact of technology anxiety on WTP for home security features","Impact":"Reduced adoption of home security measures due to technology anxiety","Mitigation":"Provide user-friendly security systems, offer technical support, and improve digital literacy","Technologies":"Smart home security systems, biometric authentication, and user-friendly interfaces","People":"Residents with technology anxiety, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Home security companies, local government, community organizations"}]}
